appShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the app's name.

appDescription.message: This extension assists to stock URLs and access quickly any one of them.

optFormInstruction.message: * To save a value in a text field, press EnterKey after you edit the text.

optCurrentUrlLabel.description: The label of current url input field.

optShortcutKeyLabel.description: The label of shortcut key input field.

optShortcutKeyHint.message: Input 1 letter of the alphabet or number as shortcut key. (e.g. 'q', 'a', '1', etc...)
optShortcutKeyHint.description: The hint of shortcut key input field.

optAvailableSiteLabel.description: The label of URL input field where this extension is available

optAvailableSiteHint.message: Enter URL where you want to use this extension. If not entered, it will be enabled for all sites. (e.g. 'http://www.google.com/', 'https://docs.flutter.dev/get-started/', etc...)
optAvailableSiteHint.description: The hint of URL input field where this extension is available

optStocksEnabledLabel.description: The label of history enabled status checkbox.

optStocksCapacitySaveButton.description: The label of history capacity save button.

optStocksCapacityHint.message: Input a number as capacity of histories. (Recommended: 10 or less)

optSaveCompletionDialogTitle.description: The title of save completion dialog

optSaveCompletionDialogMessage.description: The message of save completion dialog

optResetConfirmationDialogTitle.description: The title of reset confirmation dialog

optResetConfirmationDialogMessage.message: Are you sure you want to load defaults?  when chose ok, initialize all settings (URLs will be deleted, including history).
optResetConfirmationDialogMessage.description: The message of reset confirmation dialog

optResetCompletionDialogMessage.message: Settings have been restored to their default values.

optAvailableSiteUpdatedMessage.description: The message when the available site url is updated

optShortcutKeyUpdatedMessage.description: The message when the shortcut key is updated

optCurrentUrlUpdatedMessage.description: The message when the current URL is updated

optStocksEnabledUpdatedMessage.description: The message when the history enabled status is updated

optStocksCapacityUpdatedMessage.description: The message when the capacity of histories is updated

optStockItemTitleUpdatedMessage.description: The message when the name of historical record is updated
